entry.title: Week 39, 2025: Package updates for ppx_deriving with oxidized patches and opam compatibility issues reported
entry.content:
Summary

One PR for zarith library update remains open while ppx_deriving oxidized version was successfully merged

Activity

  • Zarith library update to version 1.14+ox by Anil Madhavapeddy remains open after fixing linking errors and bad rebase issues (#14)
  • PPX deriving package integration completed by Patrick Ferris with oxidized patches for oxcaml compatibility (#13)
  • Repository update issues reported by Henry Till affecting opam 2.3.0 users on Debian with patch application failures (#15)
entry.summary: Package updates for ppx_deriving with oxidized patches and opam compatibility issues reported

entry.title: Week 38, 2025: Issue reported for js_of_ocaml-compiler compilation failure with patch application errors
entry.content:
Summary

Single issue opened reporting jsofocaml-compiler build failure

Activity

  • Build compilation error reported by Gopher for jsofocaml-compiler package with patch application failures affecting iarray primitives and floatarraycreatelocal patches (#12)
entry.summary: Issue reported for js_of_ocaml-compiler compilation failure with patch application errors

entry.title: Week 37, 2025: Fixed js_of_ocaml patch compatibility issue across multiple packages
entry.content:
Summary

Single bug fix merged addressing patch application failures in jsofocaml ecosystem

Activity

  • jsofocaml patch fixes merged by Matthew Else resolving installation failures on macOS with opam 2.4.1 (#11)
  • Patch compatibility discussion emerged regarding differences between GNU Patch and hannesm/patch behavior, with investigation needed for proper upstream fix (#11)
entry.summary: Fixed js_of_ocaml patch compatibility issue across multiple packages

entry.title: Week 36, 2025: Major package updates delivered including js_of_ocaml toplevel support, eio integration, and documentation tools
entry.content:
Summary

One new PR opened for jsofocaml patches alongside completion of major package integration work

Activity

  • New PR opened by Matthew Else fixing jsofocaml patch issues that were preventing successful installation (#11)
  • Documentation infrastructure completed by Jon Ludlam with comprehensive odoc toolchain integration including all related packages and eio support for odoc driver functionality (#8)
  • Development tools enhanced through utop 2.16.0 upgrade (#10) and mdx literate programming updates (#9)
  • JavaScript compilation improvements delivered with toplevel support and unified patches across jsofocaml package family (#7)
entry.summary: Major package updates delivered including js_of_ocaml toplevel support, eio integration, and documentation tools

entry.title: Week 35, 2025: Added patched eio and odoc ecosystem packages for Oxcaml compatibility
entry.content:
Summary

Two new PRs opened for package ecosystem integration with extensive collaboration on source URL management

Activity

  • Two new PRs opened during the week by Jon Ludlam: odoc and eio integration (#8) and mdx patch updates (#9), both merged in early September
  • Package source strategy discussion between Jon Ludlam and Anil Madhavapeddy regarding git+https URLs versus patch files for easier maintenance (#8)
  • Comprehensive package integration work involving 15+ opam files added for the complete odoc documentation toolchain and eio async I/O library ecosystem
entry.summary: Added patched eio and odoc ecosystem packages for Oxcaml compatibility

entry.title: Week 30, 2025: js_of_ocaml toplevel support added with unified patches and new PR opened for future integration
entry.content:
Summary

Single PR opened for jsofocaml toplevel integration with significant implementation work completed

Activity

  • New PR opened by Jon Ludlam to enable jsofocaml toplevel functionality, incorporating patches from Patrick Ferris with unified approach across all jsofocaml packages (#7)
  • Implementation completed during the week with 1,165 lines added and 116 lines deleted across 23 files, covering jsofocaml-compiler, jsofocaml-ppx, jsofocaml-toplevel, and jsofocaml packages (#7)
entry.summary: js_of_ocaml toplevel support added with unified patches and new PR opened for future integration

entry.title: Week 27, 2025: Package maintenance week with ocaml_simd fixes and compiler tag updates by Max Slater
entry.content:
Summary

Single maintenance PR merged fixing package installation and build issues

Activity

  • Package maintenance completed by Max Slater addressing ocaml_simd installation problems and build script compatibility issues (#6)
entry.summary: Package maintenance week with ocaml_simd fixes and compiler tag updates by Max Slater

entry.title: Week 26, 2025: Extended testing infrastructure to support more Linux distributions and arm64 architecture with dependency fixes
entry.content:
Summary

Two PRs merged focusing on CI infrastructure improvements and build dependency management

Activity

  • CI infrastructure improvements completed by Puneeth Chaganti with testing expansion to multiple Linux distributions and arm64 support (#5)
  • Build dependency fixes merged to ensure compatibility with Archlinux by adding conf-which and marking conf-autoconf as build dependencies (#4)
  • GitHub Actions workflow refactoring with extraction of reusable action and separation of Linux container testing from macOS testing for better organization
entry.summary: Extended testing infrastructure to support more Linux distributions and arm64 architecture with dependency fixes

entry.title: Week 25, 2025: Package dependency improvements and CI infrastructure establishment for oxcaml variant distribution
entry.content:
Summary

Established comprehensive CI infrastructure and resolved build compatibility issues across multiple platforms

Activity

  • Continuous integration setup by Puneeth Chaganti with GitHub Actions testing OCaml variant 5.2.0+ox across Ubuntu x64/arm64 and macOS Intel/arm64 platforms (#3)
  • Build script compatibility fix for ppxlib_ast cleanup script to use bash explicitly, resolving build failures (#1)
  • Package testing expanded with additional packages verified through CI infrastructure as confirmed by @dkalinichenko-js (#3)
entry.summary: Package dependency improvements and CI infrastructure establishment for oxcaml variant distribution

entry.title: Week 24, 2025: Added CI workflow, fixed build issues, and completed package rebranding from Jane Street to OxCaml
entry.content:
Summary

Three PRs merged focusing on CI infrastructure and build fixes by Puneeth Chaganti

Activity

  • CI infrastructure established with Puneeth Chaganti adding GitHub Actions workflow for automated testing across Ubuntu and macOS platforms (#3)
  • Build system fixes delivered through two consecutive PRs fixing ppxlib_ast cleanup script execution by Puneeth Chaganti (#1, #2)
  • Package ecosystem update involving hundreds of package variants renamed from +jst to +ox suffix, completing the transition from Jane Street to OxCaml branding across the entire repository
  • Documentation overhaul transforming README from Jane Street to OxCaml branding with enhanced installation instructions and platform compatibility details
entry.summary: Added CI workflow, fixed build issues, and completed package rebranding from Jane Street to OxCaml
